title: New: Eyelid Kid – Sleeps Well On Knives
body:
California’s **Eyelid Kid** impressed on their debut track, [Time Travel](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/27935-new-eyelid-kid-time-travel), and are now back with another slice of perfectly crafted indie-pop. _Sleeps Well On Knives_ is part Vampire Weekend, part The Shins and 100% made for festival crowds, and not only that, but really feels like the beginning of something rather special for Eyelid Kid. Check it out below, and find out a bit more about the band via a Stereogum [interview](http://www.stereogum.com/1695681/band-to-watch-eyelid-kid-sleeps-well-on-knives-stereogum-premiere/franchises/band-to-watch/).

excerpt.full: California’s Eyelid Kid impressed on their debut track, Time Travel, and are now back with another slice of perfectly crafted indie-pop. Sleeps Well On Knives is part Vampire Weekend, part The Shins and 100% made for festival crowds, and not only that, but really feels like the beginning of something rather special for Eyelid Kid. \[…\]
